question: Which company has announced the health insurance policy to benefit LGBT employees?
explanation: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has announced changes in its health insurance policy in order to provide benefits to employees involved in LGBT employees, a same-sex relationship. TCS became the first Tata Group companies to bring the change. The change in health insurance policy will benefit all bisexual, lesbian, gay, and transgender or LGBT employees in the company. The new health policy of the IT services major redefines spouse as a partner. The insurance policy will cover up to 50% cost of sex or gender reassignment surgery.
